channel.title: Strategic Partnerships on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Strategic Partnerships on FinanClub

item.title: WBD
item.description: score:1003 Chances: Warner Bros. Discovery plans to add live sports to its streaming service Max, potentially launching with MLB playoffs in October. Paramount reported Q2 results beating estimates and announced a $1.62 billion deal with KKR for Simon & Schuster business. Barbie movie grossed $1 billion globally in just 17 days, marking a milestone for director Greta Gerwig and potential changes in film production.

item.title: PBR-A
item.description: score:1205 Chances: Petrobras’ potential increase in investments and capital expenditures in its next five-year business plan reflects a commitment to growth and expansion, supported by President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s focus on driving a green transition. The company’s strategy to raise the average capacity use of its refineries and break production records for diesel showcases operational efficiency and the ability to adapt to market demands.
